Class ItemAnimatedInventory

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack>, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory

    public class ItemAnimatedInventory
extends com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory.InventoryBase
    Redirects calls to a base inventory, while showing item animations during item transfers
